sourcesContent:
import {
    IonCard,
    IonCardContent,
    IonCardHeader,
    IonCardSubtitle, IonLabel,
    IonSegment,
    IonSegmentButton,
    IonCardTitle
} from '@ionic/react';
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react';
const ViewCourse: React.FC = () => {
    return (
        <IonCard>
            <IonCardHeader>
                <IonCardTitle>My course name</IonCardTitle>
                <IonCardSubtitle>
                    <>
                        <IonSegment value="course">
                            <IonSegmentButton value="course">
                                <IonLabel>Course</IonLabel>
                            </IonSegmentButton>
                            <IonSegmentButton value="topic">
                                <IonLabel>Topic</IonLabel>
                            </IonSegmentButton>
                        </IonSegment>
                    </>
                </IonCardSubtitle>
            </IonCardHeader>

            <IonCardContent>
                Here's a small text description for the card content. Nothing more, nothing less.
            </IonCardContent>
        </IonCard>



    );
}
export default ViewCourse;
